e: ￹`Sa~`lofen~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `noya~ `wawa~.￺Correct that child.￻請糾正那小孩的心思意念
￹`Sa~`lofen~ `ita~ `ko~ `ni~`tilid~`an~ `ita~ `a~ `kimad~.￺We must edit the story we wrote.￻我們要修改我們寫的故事
￹`Ma~`salof~ `koya~ `demak~ `anini~.￺That matter has been rectified.￻那件事已經修正了
d.f: ￹￺to correct * rectify * amend￻修正，矯正，改正
